statements: UPDATE high_net_worth_clients SET assets = 500000.00, liabilities = 200000.00 WHERE client_id = 1;

UPDATE high_net_worth_clients SET assets = assets + 10000, expenses = expenses - 500 WHERE client_id = 1;
UPDATE high_net_worth_clients SET liabilities = liabilities + 20000, income = income * 1.1 WHERE client_id = 2;
